name: Perfectly Thawed Heart
description:
What if a stage 1 boss used her full power, and what if she did it because of a cute maid she met? This is a retelling of Touhou 7: Perfect Cherry Blossom from the perspective of Letty Whiterock, for Touhou Pride Game Jam  4.

This work freely interprets the characters and story elements of the Touhou Project, which belongs to Team Shanghai Alice. It is not affiliated with nor endorsed by Team Shanghai Alice.

----------------------------------------------------
